SELECT ifnull( ( SELECT SUM(hbr.recover_interest_yes) FROM ht_borrow_recover hbr INNER JOIN ht_borrow hb ON hb.borrow_nid = hbr.borrow_nid WHERE hbr.recover_yestime >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{beginDate}) AND hbr.accede_order_id IS NULL AND hbr.recover_yestime < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate})
AND( hb.borrow_style = 'endday' OR hb.borrow_style = 'end' ) ) , 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT SUM(hbrp.recover_interest_yes) FROM ht_borrow_recover_plan hbrp INNER JOIN ht_borrow hb ON hb.borrow_nid = hbrp.borrow_nid WHERE hbrp.recover_yestime >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{beginDate}) AND hbrp.accede_order_id IS NULL AND hbrp.recover_yestime < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}) AND( hb.borrow_style = 'month' OR hb.borrow_style = 'endmonth' ) ) , 0 ) + ifnull( ( SELECT sum(received_interest) FROM ht_hjh_accede WHERE acctual_payment_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{beginDate}) AND acctual_payment_time < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}) ) , 0 ) AS sumAccount

SELECT ui.sex AS sex , count(1) AS count FROM ( SELECT br.user_id FROM hyjf_trade.ht_borrow_tender br WHERE br.create_time <= #{endDate) AND br.create_time >= #{beginDate} AND br.accede_order_id is NULL UNION SELECT user_id FROM hyjf_trade.ht_credit_tender WHERE create_time <= #{endDate} AND create_time >= #{beginDate} UNION SELECT user_id FROM hyjf_trade.ht_hjh_accede WHERE create_time <= #{endDate} AND create_time >= #{beginDate} ) t LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_user u ON t.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_user_info ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id WHERE ui.sex = 2 OR ui.sex = 1 GROUP BY ui.sex;
